short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TAGDit enables teams to build a shared knowledge base of web pages and information that can benefit all.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TAGDit is designed to support a team's internet research data management. Use our clipper to save any internet content to TAGDit.  

TAGDit allows teams to easily collaborate, organize, and share information. Tag web pages, save multimedia content and consider data governance types to enhance your collective knowledge base.

We launched the TAGDit Clipper so you can save any page on the web to your team. Capture and organize all the articles, research, and inspiration you want, and weâ€™ll help you turn them into actionable knowledge.
 

"TAG" AND SAVE WITH ONE CLICK.
If you come across something you want to keep, just use the TAGDit button on the top right of your browser!

ORGANIZE IMMEDIATELY.
Choose exactly where you want to save your web pages. Add internet research data and internal data to projects, articles to reading lists, and more.

TAG, SHARE, COMMENT.
TAGDit makes it easy to tag information, add comments and annotations, and categorize content such as competitor or customer data. Assign tags to teammates, format posts, and include detailed references.

FLEXIBLE CONTENT SAVING.
Save various types of content including web pages, articles, PDFs, videos, pictures, selected text, and audio (where possible). Download files to your computer or copy images as needed.


You can read and manage the pages you tag on any device. Happy tagging!
